data.name: Warframe: Master Thief Pinnacle Pack
data.detailed_description:
BONUS: Get the Orthos Polearm and Steam-Exclusive Orthos Onyx Skin for free! (Limit one per account.)

750 Platinum to use towards new Warframes, Weapons, Equipment and more
100,000 Credits to assist in making new upgrades to your Arsenal
10 Random Mod Cards to instantly upgrade your Arsenal
6 Rare Mod Cards to add hard-to-find modifications to your Inventory
3 Exilus Adapters to instantly unlock an Exilus Mod Slot for Mobility and Utility advancements
Equilibrium Mod to gain Energy from Health pickups and Health from Energy pickups
Endurance Drift Mod to increase Max Energy and Parkour Velocity
Master Thief Mod to grant a chance to unlock locked containers
3-Day Resource Booster to double the amount of Resource pickups
3-Day Resource Drop Chance Booster to increase the chance of Rare Resource pickups
3-Day Affinity Booster to quickly level up your Weapons, Warframes, and more
3-Day Credit Booster to increase the number of Credits you pick up

*The stats displayed in the above Mod images depict Max Rank stats all new Mods start Unranked

NOTE: Items will be added to your account upon next login. If you have multiple Warframe accounts, items will be delivered to the Warframe Account linked with your Steam Account.

data.short_description: Are you a Master Thief? Stock up for some legendary larceny with this pack containing Platinum, Credits, Rare Mods, Boosters and more! BONUS: Get the Orthos Polearm and Steam-Exclusive Orthos Onyx Skin for free!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 10+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

package_groups.title: Buy Warframe: Master Thief Pinnacle Pack

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
